input_text:
Job Title: Assembler - 3rd (11pm - 7am)

Location: Wooster, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Why Choose Stahl?*

At Stahl, we boast a rich legacy dating back to 1946, driven by an unwavering commitment to crafting innovative, high-quality products for our esteemed clientele. Joining our team means investing in your future. If you possess the right blend of skills, experience, dependability, and reliability, we're dedicated to nurturing your career through personalized mentoring, comprehensive job training, and abundant long-term growth opportunities.

*Perks and Benefits*

 *$1000 Sign-On Bonus*: Earned after six months of dedicated service. *Paid Breaks*: Your well-being matters; enjoy the opportunity to recharge. *Competitive Wages and Career Advancement*: Recognizing and rewarding talent, with clear paths for progression. *Comprehensive Benefits Package*: Including medical, dental, and vision insurance, alongside voluntary coverage for Life, Critical Illness, and Accident insurance. Benefit from company-paid life and AD&D insurance, and Short-Term Disability coverage. *PENSION/401(k)*: Invest in your future with our retirement savings plan. *Vacation and Holiday Allowance*: Prioritizing work-life balance. *Referral Bonus*: Be rewarded for bringing talented individuals into our team. *Safety Gear Reimbursement*: Including support for safety shoes and prescription safety eyewear.

*Position Summary*

As a vital member of our team, you'll be responsible for various fitting-out, mounting, wiring, decaling, and installation tasks on a range of truck bodies.

*Duties and Responsibilities*

 Cutting and installing rubber using glue or clips. Installing lock cylinders, door holders, trays, shelves, and tailgates. Mounting doors, fenders, tailgates, and lids. Fitting bumpers, hitches, ladder racks, and windows. Wiring utility bodies according to engineering specifications. Mounting utility bodies to engineering standards. Installing additional options as per engineering specifications. Ensuring the quality of products leaving the yard. Maintaining and utilizing required tools, including air tools, torches, hand tools, tape measures, glue, and tape. Adhering to all safety and housekeeping protocols. Fulfilling any other duties as assigned by the Supervisor.

*Requirements*

 High school diploma, GED, or equivalent, with proficiency in written and verbal English communication. Strong organizational skills and ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment. Proven decision-making capabilities and problem-solving skills. Effective and professional communication with colleagues, vendors, and customers. One year of sheet metal experience or related experience preferred.

Join us at Stahl, where your dedication and professional acumen meet a supportive environment dedicated to your growth and success.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: From $20.00 per hour

Expected hours: No less than 40 per week

Benefits

 401(k) Dental insurance Employee assistance program Health insurance Life insurance Paid time off Retirement plan Vision insurance

Schedule

 8 hour shift

Supplemental Pay Types

 Signing bonus

Application Question(s)

 What is your hourly pay preference? Part of the Pre-Employment Screening will be a background check and a drug screen, will this be a problem?

Experience

 Assembly: 2 years (Preferred) Blueprint reading: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Assembler - 3rd (11pm - 7am)
output_json.summary: Join Stahl, a legacy company since 1946, for a full-time position with competitive wages, benefits, and growth opportunities.

Installing lock cylinders, door holders, trays, shelves, and tailgates.
Mounting doors, fenders, tailgates, and lids.
Fitting bumpers, hitches, ladder racks, and windows.
Wiring utility bodies according to engineering specifications.
Mounting utility bodies to engineering standards.
Installing additional options as per engineering specifications.
Ensuring the quality of products leaving the yard.
output_json.company_information: Stahl boasts a rich legacy dating back to 1946, driven by an unwavering commitment to crafting innovative, high-quality products.
